title: Beautiful Studio With Amazing Specials!
posting_body: THE GOOD LIFE JUST GOT BETTER
Join us for a self-guided or virtual tour!
Explore your new home from the comfort of your couch, or on a self-guided journey through our Neighborhood.
At 128 on State apartments in the heart of Kirkland, we offer luxury studio, one, and two-bedroom apartments.
Just steps away from Moss Bay waterfront and downtown dining, take your pick of an evening adventure.
Designed for modern lifestyles, our apartment homes feature stainless steel appliances, dual pane windows, and spacious walk-in closets.
Our large terraces are perfect for a gathering with friends, and our 24/7 package lockers ensure that your parcels arrive safe and secure.
Located in the heart of Downtown Kirkland, enjoy easy access to restaurants, parks, shopping, and high-tech companies—not to mention an excellent school district.
(Pricing and availability subject to change, plus additional costs for utilities and third-party maintenance services.)
